## IHandleMessageArgs.save property

Optional. If set to `true`<!-- -->, the message will be saved using [dataStoreSaveMessage](./daf-core.idatastore.datastoresavemessage.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
save?: boolean;
```
